travel.travelSixMonthControl: The travel time of your policy exceeds 6 months. Each time you travel abroad, your guarantee is limited to 6 weeks for touristic or business purposes and 6 months for student travel. Your policy provides guarantee for a total of 184 days of travel per year.
travel.travelIsDepartureDateSameWithToday: Policies purchased today start to provide coverage after 24 hours. In order for your policy to be valid, it must be purchased before exiting TC customs.
